WW_Relics_Red_Headband.NAME: Red Headband
WW_Relics_Red_Headband.FLAVOR: Placing it in your head gives some focus against distractions.
DESCRIPTIONS: Each turn, the first Status or Curse card drawn is discarded, then draw a random card from the draw pile, if there is any card there.
